attributes.action: Bar all Exports of Gas from the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While all or some of our Gasometers have storage space the export of gas abroad should not be allowed by law.This would maintain our stocks to help with supply during the winter and help reduce costs. It is noticable that at the moment all or most of the gasometers are empty or very low and gas is being exported which we will  then re import at a much higher cost next winter
